Useful links

Here is a collection of some links commonly used when starting LArSoft:

  • Last LArTPC Software and Analysis Workshop (8-11 November 2022): 7th UK LArTPC Software and Analysis Workshop
  • LArSoft code repository: LArSoft github repository
  • Tutorial on how to install LArSoft (Fermilab account required)Redmine, How to setup your directory and launch your first job
  • SBND Code Wiki (Fermilab account required): Redmine, SBND code

Some other useful links:

  • Paper containing particles PDG: Particles PDG
  • SBN Document Database (Contains talks and documents of the collaboration):SBN Document Database
  • LPC Analysis Facility troubleshooting Connect to the LPC CAF (Central Analysis Facility)
  • SBND computer access (Fermilab account required):Redmine, Computing resources
  • SBND VNC tutorial for SBN: Viewing events remotely with VNC
